content.title: Reference Type
content.content:
The `reference` type allows you to define a **unidirectional link** between documents, either within the same store or across different stores.

It is one of the **parameterized field types** provided by the core module.

Example of a *blog* content schema that has a field referencing documents from the *author* collection:

```yaml
name: blog
type: collection
fields:
  - name: content
    type: rich-text
    required: true
  
  - name: author
    label: Author of the post
    required: true
    type:
      name: reference
      params:
        store: author
```

The `reference` type has only one mandatory parameter:

| Parameter | Type   | Mandatory | Description                                                             |
|-----------|--------|-----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| store     | string | yes       | Specifies the authorized store (content schema) that can be referenced. |
